question: The Union cabinet has adopted the Panchayat Raj Act in which state/UT?
explanation:
The Union cabinet has recently approved the adoption of the Jammu and Kashmir Panchayat Raj Act.
After this approval, all the three tiers of grassroots-level democracy will be established in Jammu and Kashmir, for the first time since independence in Jammu and Kashmir, similar to other parts of the country. The process for local body elections will start in the Union territory.
